about_the_game:
Luigi-Maria Rapisarda, composer of the TinyShot soundtrack:
"A fairy tale, a hero, the devil, his little minions and a marvelous story. Loud, glowing colors and a little hero who is battling through all of it to reach his treasure.
An opera garbed in retro! Inspired by the grand masters of 16bit classics of the past years, the soundtrack for TinyShot came to life."

content_descriptors.notes: A few items in the game this soundtrack is from refer to hallucinogenics.

short_description: The Official TinyShot Soundtrack includes a collection of 17 atmospheric tracks from the game's arcade shooting action. All tracks are composed by Luigi-Maria Rapisarda.
